reviewText:
Saw this tape in Blockbuster about 6 years ago and rented it.  Took it back and couldn,t find it next time I went.  If you,re a "SANFORD & SON" fan, you will love this live performance by two of the funniest guys in the business!

Leroy and Skillet will keep you laughing with bawdy humor from the beginning of the show till the end!  Raunchy adult humor (but nowhere near as rough as Redd Foxx) is not for the kids!  A rare club performance that will keep you in stitches!

So if you like blue humor by all means order this tape. You will not be disappointed!
That's right. You've seen them on Sanford and Son. Redd Foxx's buddies from the chittlin' circuit. Wild Wild comedy. You will laugh whether you want to or not. True Kings of Comedy.
